messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR ERIC OLLERENSHAW
messages.content: 1. Lancashire born and bred 2. Experienced and hard working 3. My commitment to you

messages.title: A RECORD OF ACTION IN LANCASTER AND FLEETWOOD
messages.content: Born and bred in Lancashire, and having lived in Lancaster for the last 3 years, I know your area has been ignored. Too many politicians have let us down, especially over expenses. I believe MPs should be accountable and transparent and you can see my commitment at www.ericollerenshaw.com.

messages.title: 5 MORE YEARS OF GORDON BROWN OR CHANGE WITH THE CONSERVATIVES
messages.content: Just a few weeks left to secure real change with the Conservatives or five more years stuck with Gordon Brown's tired government.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservatives aim to help make Britain more competitive and get the economy moving again.
Commitment to support National Health Service.
Focus on improving education and raising standards in schools.
Support for families through policies that enhance family life and well-being.

leaflet.personalStatement: Born and bred in Lancashire, and having lived in Lancaster for the last 3 years, I know your area has been ignored.

images.caption: Pictures depicting various campaign activities and interactions with the public.
